content.raw:
@hsu 
Ah, yes, there was an error in the r2 launch files (it wasnt looking in the right directory for the world file).  So that actually makes me able to run things... 
Thanks! 

So is the issue that I pulled an update this morning that fails on not finding the world file, rather then just proceeding without one?
